review: Fantastic little device.  Similar display as Roku, which I have in another room.  Love the versatility and options.  Highly recommend.

review: This was a great gift to receive. I reduced my cable to basic and just stream from this. So happy I got to see "Transparent"! That is worth it alone! Lots of great free content as a prime member too!

review: Love the Fire TV Stick and the ease of using it.  It is great to be able to access so many movies and programs in one spot!
